Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Are YOU looking for <clr:0000>stuff that fell from
the sky <clr:ffff>too?!
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I told you already! Weren't you listening?
I'm talking about the <clr:0000>boxes<clr:ffff> that fall from
the sky!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Do you think you could go into the sky if
you had lots of <clr:0000>big balloons<clr:ffff> like the one
on the <clr:0000>other side of the pond<clr:ffff>?
LargeHorse: I want a ride on that.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, it's time to say good night. We'll
talk again tomorrow!<sp:0:4:0>If I don't sleep lots and grow up quick, I'll
never be able to go to the land in the sky!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And that means a sky person's gotta be
dropping them!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I always knew there was a kingdom in the
sky, and I've always dreamed of going up
there to play with all the sky animals!
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I'm still little, so I'm not allowed to go
too far away...
Talk_17: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sleep>When I grow up...I'm going for sure...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Fine, then! <sp:5:0:0>Looking for stuff that <clr:0000>fell from
the sky <clr:ffff>is more fun by myself anyway!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>There aren't many clouds right now, so
you can get a really good look at the
land in the sky!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's all dark and dreary now, so you can
barely see the land in the sky.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's really easy to slip in the rain, and
lightning can be dangerous...

That's why my grandpa told me good kids
take shelter when it rains!

Come on, mister, let's go find a tree to
hide under!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I wanna hurry and be all grown up like
you, mister. Then I can go up there!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I wonder if another box will fall from the
sky... <sp:5:0:0>What do you think it's like up there?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>*sigh* I hope I can go there someday.
I wanna play with all the sky animals!
Near_02: I hope I can see it today!
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sometimes when I'm looking at the sky,
a big <clr:0000>box<clr:ffff> falls down from that island!
Talk_32:
When I'm looking at the sky like this,
sometimes these big <clr:0000>boxes<clr:ffff> come
craaashing down!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Outta my way! I gotta go look at the
kingdom of the sky!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Even with the rain, it's so bright out that
you can still see the land in the sky!
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's so dreary out now that you can barely
see the land in the sky.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's time for good kids to go to sleep.
No more looking at <clr:0000>the land in the sky<clr:ffff>...
because I'm a good kid...<sp:5:1:0>I guess.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
If you come back tomorrow, will you help
me look for <clr:0000>stuff that fell from up there<clr:ffff>?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh... Is this your first time here, mister?
Welcome! This is <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I'll see you later, then! Once I'm all
grown up, let's meet again in the
kingdom of the sky!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're looking for <clr:0000>stuff that fell from the
sky<clr:ffff> too, right, mister?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>You don't know?!<sp:0:4:0>Look up there—<sp:5:0:0>there's an island floating
in the sky! You see it too, right?
